Content: \frac{\partial \lambda_i}{\partial K_{(k\ell)}} = \frac{\partial}{\partial K_{(k\ell)}}\left(\lambda_{0i} + \mathbf{x}^T_{0i} ([\delta K] - \lambda_{0i}[\delta M]) \mathbf{x}_{0i}\right) = x_{0i(k)} x_{0i(\ell)} (2-\delta_k^\ell)
Reference: \frac{\partial \lambda_i}{\partial K_{(k\ell)}} = \frac{\partial}{\partial K_{(k\ell)}}\left(\lambda_{0i} + \mathbf{x}^T_{0i} ([\delta K] - \lambda_{0i}[\delta M]) \mathbf{x}_{0i}\right) = x_{0i(k)} x_{0i(\ell)} (2-\delta_k^\ell)
